name: Zippy Detective: Cats
description:
Are you ready to roam the city and find hidden cats?



Zippy Detective: Cats is a puzzle game where you explore an atmospheric city and try to find hidden cats. The objective of the game is to find the hidden cats located in different parts of the city, bring them to the area in front of the Eiffel Tower, and earn all the achievements in the game.



Avoid flying ships and waiting geese that may chase you while trying to find the cats. Flying ships may snatch the cats you are after, making it harder for you to retrieve them. If you collide with geese, your screen will be covered in feathers and you may lose the game.



Moreover, the customizable theme of the game provides players with the freedom to personalize their experience. Players can choose the theme that suits them best, in addition to the atmospheric environment, and customize their game experience. The four different theme options within the game provide players with a different atmospheric feel each time they play, offering them a unique experience every time.



If you enjoy puzzle games such as "Hidden Folks" and "A Building Full of Cats," then Zippy Detective: Cats may be the perfect option for you. So come on, find the hidden cats in the city and send them all to space by bringing them to the area in front of the Eiffel Tower!
